text: our integration with attunity and with
redshift has really leveled the playing
field for us
as far as what we were able to achieve
with our analytics
my name is daniel hicock and i'm a
systems analyst
at etix etix is an electronic ticketing
company
we provide a box office solution to our
customers who are
venue owners casinos fairs festivals
basically we provide a service that
enables them to engage their customers
and to sell tickets
as a transaction-based business we
needed the ability to also do analytics
processing
and so that's where redshift was a very
appealing product to us
for a number of reasons for one with the
tunity we were able to
load the data into redshift very quickly
and then for two we were able to start
accessing the data very easily with
jaspersoft to give you an idea of
how quick it was for us to get started
with this i mentioned the
possibility of using redshift and
attunity
to integrate our data into redshift and
two weeks later
we were doing it in production i mean we
we
have had a lot of data
throughout our history as a company we
have 13 years of transactional data
but now we're actually able to utilize
it so that is one of the
main benefits of having the data
in redshift attunity is a data
replication
company the product that we're using is
their replicate for redshift
attunity is managing the data
replication
from our on-premise oracle data center
into redshift and then once it's in
redshift
i'm able to use that data by plugging in
jaspersoft
we were able to spin up an ec2 instance
through the aws marketplace
work with jaspersoff within 10 minutes
of setting it up
i immediately had access to data that i
did not have access to
before by using aws data pipeline
we're actually able to manage certain
types of
batch jobs that perform really
large computations across giant data
sets
and then store that information and then
retrieve it for reporting purposes
so we were able to find a data warehouse
solution that was roughly a tenth of the
cost of any other
solution that was out there we are now
able to compete with some of the
biggest companies in the world that are
spending hundreds of millions of dollars
on
technology solutions
